Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Estilo Fashion Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Budapest, steps from Great Market Hall and Corvinus University of Budapest. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of V치ci Street and Eotvos Lorand University.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages and facials. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Budapest? This hotel has facilities measuring 452 square feet (42 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Great Market Hall - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Corvinus University of Budapest - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
V치ci Street - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Eotvos Lorand University - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

Petofi Literary Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi

Cave Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

Vaci Street - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Franciscan Church - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Ferenciek Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
P치risi Udvar - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Gellert Thermal Baths and Swimming Pool - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Inner City Parish Church - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Estilo Fashion Hotel is Budapest (BUD-Ferenc Liszt Intl.) - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
